portlet.title: Exposure File Notes
portlet.description: A portlet that lists the notes attached to this Exposure File.

portlet.title: Exposure Info
portlet.description: A portlet that shows the information available for the exposure.

portlet.title: Exposure Curation
portlet.description: A portlet that shows the curation of the exposure.

portlet.title: Exposure Source
portlet.description: A portlet that shows the source of the exposure.

portlet.title: Exposure Collaboration
portlet.description: This portlet displays information on how to collaborate with the workspace protocol.

portlet.title: Exposure Download
portlet.description: A portlet that shows the download options available for the exposure object.

portlet.title: Workspace Exposure Info
portlet.description: This portlet searches the catalog for the latest exposure for this workspace.
